original_text: an incredibly irritating comedy about thoroughly vacuous people . . . manages to embody the worst excesses of nouvelle vague without any of its sense of fun or energy .
generated_text:
1. "a laughless, cringe-worthy farce about shallow characters... fails to capture the essence of its genre without any of its wit or charm."
2. "a tedious, uninspired rom-com about vapid people... lacks the freshness and excitement of its contemporaries."
